section.title: Markup
section.para: The Markup handler class, like the Composite handler, is a stack, thus allowing you to push any number of Zend_Markup_Renderer_RendererAbstract. If the markup stack is empty, an exception will be thrown, stating that no markups were pushed in the stack. Otherwise, the handle function will recursively dig into the Zend_Config object and render every $key => value using all of the markups.
